winDialogues: You're so cool. Let's go to my place!
Oh my god, you're my ideal. I'd marry you!
I think I'm in love. You know me like we've known each other forever!
loseDialogues: Sorry, you're not my type. Too many red flags.
I think we're done here. Goodbye.
You're just like the rest. We're not meant to be.
I don't know who could love you, definitely not me.
No wonder you're single, with that personality.

questions.question: How much do you earn per year?

options.reactionText: God… I didn't know you were that broke.
Wow. So you're a businessman after all.
I don't like it when people lie.

questions.question: So, what kind of dogs do you like?

options.reactionText: I prefer short-haired dogs.
I don't get the point of small dogs.
Oh… yeah. Same.

questions.question: I have an important question. What's your zodiac sign?

options.reactionText: So you're reliable, like a rock. I like that.
That's unfortunate. Scorpios are jealous manipulators.
A dragon? That's not a zodiac sign.

questions.question: If I feel bad, How will you help me feel better?

options.reactionText: Aww, you're so romantic!
Oh god. That's so cringe.
I see. Avoidant attachment style.

questions.question: What will you do if you see me with another guy?

options.reactionText: Ooo, now that's my boy!
I don't like cowards.
So you have no backbone at all.

questions.question: What will you do if I'm in the shower and the door is unlocked?

options.reactionText: I don't like this kind of overprotection.
Wow, so funny. That's a red flag for sure.

options.questionText: i will continue like i didn't notice anyhing
options.reactionText: That's a green flag for sure!

questions.question: What will you do if I faint?

options.reactionText: You're so boring and stiff…
That's abuse. You watched too much Fifty Shades of Grey.
You're crazy! I love that!

questions.question: How do you feel about kids?

options.reactionText: You sound like another infantile narcissist.
I'm an only child. I always wanted siblings.
If you think I'm your mommy, you're wrong.

questions.question: How do you imagine the perfect wedding?

options.reactionText: Looks like you have no friends or family issues.
You didn't look like a rebel in your profile.
Yes. A real wedding must be with God.

questions.question: How would you introduce me to your parents?

options.reactionText: Oh, so you're spicy after all!
That's what anxious attachment looks like.
That sounds emotionally immature.

questions.question: What do you notice first when you meet a girl?

options.reactionText: Thanks for the compliment.
Classic move to avoid your own issues.
Humor is the best shield for the poor.

questions.question: What will you do if I come back drunk at night?

options.questionText: Wash my face and put me to bed
options.reactionText: Wow. Looks like you're ready to swallow any kind of nonsense.
A real man. You know your boundaries.
And that's it? No emotions at all. So dry.

questions.question: What kind of apartment do you have?

options.reactionText: Oh god, that's so sweet! A real family man.
I'm scared to imagine that dorm.
Cheap bragging. What penthouse, seriously?

questions.question: Are you listening?

options.reactionText: I don't get why guys pretend to be hard to get.

options.questionText: I hear you. Not sure why
options.reactionText: You sound kind of passive-aggressive.
Oh, you're witty! I like funny guys.

questions.question: What's your favorite type of cheese?

options.reactionText: How basic. Let me guess — pineapple pizza too?
How aristocratic. Very snobby.
Oh, same! We can always order the same food.

questions.question: Do you play board games? What's your Monopoly strategy?

options.reactionText: Such an original strategy.
That's how all kids play.
If you hate competition, just say it.

questions.question: What would you name our son?

options.reactionText: If you mean Twilight, that's a bad choice.
Zero imagination. You looked more creative in your profile.
Haha, you know the trends. John Pork.

questions.question: How should we split the bill? 50/50?

options.reactionText: So petty. Such a scarcity mindset.
Classic alpha trying to buy a girl with dinner.
I like that you don't fall for provocations!

questions.question: Do you have friends? How do you spend time together?

options.reactionText: Oh, I feel you. Same here!
I didn't know you were still in school.
I don't like gym bros. They're all narcissists.

questions.question: Do you think a girl in a relationship can go clubbing?

options.reactionText: That sounds like tyranny.
Agreed. Real relationships are built on trust.
That's how girls turn into boring plants.
